Class Character

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.copakond.sweetfluffysheep.model.utils.game.GameObject
cz.cvut.copakond.sweetfluffysheep.model.entities.Character
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICharacter, IGameObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
Sheep, Wolf
public class Character extends GameObject implements ICharacter
Character class represents a character in the game. It handles the movement, rotation, and collision detection of the character. The character can be either a sheep or an enemy (wolf).

All the characters must inherit from this class.

    • move

      public void move(double tilesSpeed, boolean doesTimeFlow)
      Moves the character in the direction it is facing. The character can be rotated by walls or arrows. The character can also be slowed down by other characters in front of it.
      Specified by:
      move in interface ICharacter
      Parameters:
      tilesSpeed - the speed of the character in tiles per second
      doesTimeFlow - if true, the character will visually rotate

    • rotateCharacterLE

      public void rotateCharacterLE()
      Rotates the character to the right. The character will rotate clockwise.

    • getTextureNumber

      protected int getTextureNumber()
      Returns the correct texture for the character, based on the current rotation state.
      Returns:
      the texture number of the character
